entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0195.10624] us-gaap:SharesOutstanding has a value of 978,049 and has been used with Treasury Stock Member on the StatementEquityComponentsAxis. This element should not have a value when used with Treasury Stock Member. FASB FAQ guidance (https://xbrl.fasb.org/resources/taxonomyfaq.pdf) 2.16 requires that specific line item elements are used for treasury shares such as TreasuryStockCommonShares and TreasuryStockPreferredShares rather than us-gaap:SharesOutstanding.
The properties of this us-gaap:SharesOutstanding fact are: Period :2022-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:TreasuryStockCommonMember Unit : shares Rule Element Id:10624 Rule version: 26.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/754811/000143774923015310/usglobal20230307_10ka.htm 5528
